article_title: Blog: PREDICTION: Race Baited Riots Return to a "A NATION of COWARDS"
article_text: Out of the Ashes... Arises Trump the Terminator

og.description: Civil disobedience in Ferguson and St. Louis, Missouri, is as predictable as a sunrise and a sunset, it's just a matter of the scale of the violence. The scab covering America's civil rights past, which had been slowly healing for the past fifty years, has now been ripped off, and Americans are being dragged back to the 1960's...
